pullRequest.title: #604 - rpm upload
pullRequest.bodyText:
Part of #604
Created test for rpm upload.

nodes.bodyText: @olenagerasimova I'd suggest to use ByteStreams.copy from Guava library here for copying of bytes, it will simplify code a little bit
@olenagerasimova guess there is typo and this method's name is supposed to be config, not configs, isn't it?
